welcome_message_body: Welcome to Myrtle Beach, where the sun, sand, and Southern charm await you. Explore our beautiful coastline, vibrant boardwalk, and renowned golf courses, and soak in all the fun and relaxation our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
